---
title: Promoted Offerings
description: The unified schema that connects brand identity, products, creative assets, and conversational AI experiences
keywords: [promoted offerings, offerings, campaigns, SI, sponsored intelligence, brand manifest]
---

**Promoted Offerings** is the core schema that unifies everything a brand wants to promote. It connects:

- **Brand identity** (who's promoting)
- **Products/offerings** (what's being promoted)
- **Creative assets** (how it's visually presented)
- **Conversational AI** (how users can interact)

This is the schema that bridges traditional advertising (creatives, media buys) with conversational commerce (Sponsored Intelligence).

## Overview

A promoted offering answers four questions:

| Question | Field | Purpose |
|----------|-------|---------|
| **Who?** | `brand_manifest` | Brand identity, logos, colors, tone |
| **What?** | `offerings` / `product_selectors` | Products, promotions, campaigns to promote |
| **How (visual)?** | `asset_selectors` / offering `assets` | Creative assets for traditional ad formats |
| **How (conversational)?** | `si_agent_url` | AI agent endpoint for interactive experiences |

```json
{
  "brand_manifest": "https://brand.com/manifest.json",
  "si_agent_url": "https://agent.brand.com/mcp",
  "offerings": [
    {
      "offering_id": "summer-sale",
      "name": "Summer Sale",
      "description": "50% off summer collection",
      "valid_to": "2025-08-31T23:59:59Z",
      "checkout_url": "https://brand.com/summer"
    }
  ]
}
```

## When to Use Promoted Offerings

### Campaign Creation

When creating a media buy, include promoted offerings to specify what's being advertised:

```json
{
  "buyer_ref": "q2-awareness",
  "promoted_offerings": {
    "brand_manifest": "https://acme.com/manifest.json",
    "offerings": [
      {
        "offering_id": "new-product-launch",
        "name": "Widget Pro Launch",
        "landing_url": "https://acme.com/widget-pro"
      }
    ]
  },
  "packages": [...]
}
```

### Conversational Commerce

When the brand has an SI agent, users can have conversations about any of the offerings:

```json
{
  "brand_manifest": "https://delta.com/manifest.json",
  "si_agent_url": "https://agent.delta.com/mcp",
  "offerings": [
    {
      "offering_id": "boston-routes",
      "name": "Boston Flights",
      "description": "Direct flights BOS-LAX, BOS-SFO, BOS-SEA",
      "keywords": ["boston", "flights", "direct", "east coast"]
    },
    {
      "offering_id": "skymiles-promo",
      "name": "Double Miles Promotion",
      "description": "Earn 2x SkyMiles on all flights booked this month",
      "valid_to": "2025-02-28T23:59:59Z"
    }
  ]
}
```

When a user expresses interest ("I need a flight to Boston"), the host can:
1. Match the intent to a relevant offering using `keywords`
2. Get offering details and matching products via `si_get_offering`
3. Initiate an SI session with the brand agent, passing the `offering_id`

### Hybrid: Creatives + Conversation

Offerings can include both creative assets for traditional ads AND be available for SI conversations:

```json
{
  "brand_manifest": "https://brand.com/manifest.json",
  "si_agent_url": "https://agent.brand.com/mcp",
  "offerings": [
    {
      "offering_id": "summer-campaign",
      "name": "Summer Sale",
      "portfolio_ref": "https://brand.com/portfolios/summer-2025.json",
      "landing_url": "https://brand.com/summer"
    }
  ]
}
```

The `portfolio_ref` provides creative assets for display/video ads, while `si_agent_url` enables conversational experiences when users want to learn more.

## Schema Reference

### Promoted Offerings

**Schema URL**: [`/schemas/core/promoted-offerings.json`](https://adcontextprotocol.org/schemas/v2/core/promoted-offerings.json)

```typescript
interface PromotedOfferings {
  // Brand identity (required)
  brand_manifest: BrandManifest | string;  // Inline object or URL

  // Conversational AI endpoint (optional)
  si_agent_url?: string;  // MCP endpoint for SI sessions

  // What to promote (choose one or both)
  offerings?: Offering[];           // Explicit offering definitions
  product_selectors?: ProductSelectors;  // Select from brand manifest catalog

  // Creative asset filtering (optional)
  asset_selectors?: AssetSelectors;
}
```

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| `brand_manifest` | object \| string | Yes | Brand manifest inline or URL reference |
| `si_agent_url` | string (uri) | No | MCP endpoint for conversational experiences |
| `offerings` | Offering[] | No | Array of specific offerings to promote |
| `product_selectors` | object | No | Selectors to choose products from brand manifest catalog |
| `asset_selectors` | object | No | Filters to select specific creative assets |

### Offering

**Schema URL**: [`/schemas/core/offering.json`](https://adcontextprotocol.org/schemas/v2/core/offering.json)

An individual promotable item—a campaign, product, service, or promotion.

```typescript
interface Offering {
  // Identity (required)
  offering_id: string;   // Unique identifier
  name: string;          // Human-readable name

  // Description
  description?: string;
  tagline?: string;

  // Validity window
  valid_from?: string;  // ISO 8601 datetime
  valid_to?: string;    // ISO 8601 datetime

  // Destinations
  checkout_url?: string;  // Purchase/conversion URL
  landing_url?: string;   // Information page

  // Creative assets
  assets?: Asset[];           // Inline assets
  portfolio_ref?: string;     // URL to creative portfolio

  // Discovery
  keywords?: string[];    // For intent matching
  categories?: string[];  // For categorization
}
```

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| `offering_id` | string | Yes | Unique identifier for referencing in SI sessions |
| `name` | string | Yes | Human-readable offering name |
| `description` | string | No | Detailed description |
| `tagline` | string | No | Short promotional tagline |
| `valid_from` | datetime | No | When offering becomes available |
| `valid_to` | datetime | No | When offering expires |
| `checkout_url` | uri | No | URL for purchase flow |
| `landing_url` | uri | No | Landing page URL |
| `assets` | Asset[] | No | Offering-specific creative assets |
| `portfolio_ref` | uri | No | Reference to creative portfolio |
| `keywords` | string[] | No | Keywords for intent matching |
| `categories` | string[] | No | Categories for filtering |

### Product Selectors

**Schema URL**: [`/schemas/core/promoted-products.json`](https://adcontextprotocol.org/schemas/v2/core/promoted-products.json)

Instead of defining explicit offerings, select products from the brand manifest's product catalog:

```typescript
interface ProductSelectors {
  manifest_skus?: string[];      // Specific SKUs
  manifest_tags?: string[];      // Products with these tags
  manifest_category?: string;    // Products in this category
  manifest_query?: string;       // Natural language query
}
```

Multiple selectors are combined with OR logic—products matching ANY criteria are selected.

```json
{
  "brand_manifest": "https://brand.com/manifest.json",
  "product_selectors": {
    "manifest_tags": ["organic", "seasonal"],
    "manifest_category": "beverages"
  }
}
```

### Asset Selectors

Filter which creative assets from the brand manifest to use:

```typescript
interface AssetSelectors {
  tags?: string[];           // Include assets with these tags
  asset_types?: AssetType[]; // Filter by type (image, video, etc.)
  exclude_tags?: string[];   // Exclude assets with these tags
}
```

```json
{
  "brand_manifest": "https://brand.com/manifest.json",
  "asset_selectors": {
    "tags": ["holiday", "premium"],
    "asset_types": ["image", "video"],
    "exclude_tags": ["archived"]
  }
}
```

## Use Cases

### Traditional Creative Campaign

No SI agent—just brand identity and asset selection for traditional ad serving:

```json
{
  "brand_manifest": {
    "name": "Bob's Burgers",
    "url": "https://bobsburgers.com"
  },
  "product_selectors": {
    "manifest_skus": ["BURGER-001", "BURGER-002"]
  },
  "asset_selectors": {
    "tags": ["summer-menu"],
    "asset_types": ["image", "video"]
  }
}
```

### Conversational-Only Experience

SI agent without traditional creative assets—pure conversational commerce:

```json
{
  "brand_manifest": "https://saas-company.com/manifest.json",
  "si_agent_url": "https://agent.saas-company.com/mcp",
  "offerings": [
    {
      "offering_id": "enterprise-demo",
      "name": "Enterprise Demo",
      "description": "See our platform in action with a personalized demo",
      "keywords": ["demo", "enterprise", "trial", "pricing"]
    },
    {
      "offering_id": "free-trial",
      "name": "14-Day Free Trial",
      "description": "Try all features free for 14 days",
      "checkout_url": "https://saas-company.com/signup",
      "keywords": ["trial", "free", "signup"]
    }
  ]
}
```

### Multi-Offer Campaign with SI

Multiple time-limited offers, all accessible via conversation:

```json
{
  "brand_manifest": "https://airline.com/manifest.json",
  "si_agent_url": "https://agent.airline.com/mcp",
  "offerings": [
    {
      "offering_id": "flash-sale-LAX",
      "name": "Flash Sale: LA Flights",
      "description": "Flights to LA from $99",
      "valid_from": "2025-02-01T00:00:00Z",
      "valid_to": "2025-02-07T23:59:59Z",
      "keywords": ["los angeles", "LA", "cheap flights", "sale"]
    },
    {
      "offering_id": "loyalty-bonus",
      "name": "Double Miles February",
      "description": "Earn 2x miles on all bookings",
      "valid_from": "2025-02-01T00:00:00Z",
      "valid_to": "2025-02-28T23:59:59Z",
      "keywords": ["miles", "loyalty", "rewards", "points"]
    }
  ]
}
```

## Integration with SI Sessions

When `si_agent_url` is present, hosts can initiate SI sessions. The `offering_id` connects the conversation to a specific offering:

### 1. User Expresses Intent

```
User: "I need flights to LA next week"
```

### 2. Host Matches to Offering

Host uses `keywords` to find relevant offerings:
- "flash-sale-LAX" matches "LA" keyword
- Check `valid_from`/`valid_to` to confirm offering is active

### 3. Host Initiates SI Session

```json
{
  "context": "User looking for flights to LA next week",
  "offering_id": "flash-sale-LAX",
  "identity": { "consent_granted": true, "user": { ... } }
}
```

### 4. Brand Agent Responds with Context

The brand agent knows which offering is active and can personalize the response:

```json
{
  "session_id": "sess_abc123",
  "response": {
    "message": "Great timing! Our LA Flash Sale is on now—flights from $99. When are you looking to travel?",
    "ui_elements": [
      {
        "type": "product_card",
        "data": {
          "title": "LA Flash Sale",
          "price": "From $99",
          "badge": "Limited Time",
          "cta": { "label": "Search Flights", "action": "search" }
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}
```

## Best Practices

### 1. Use Keywords for Discovery

Include relevant keywords so hosts can match user intent to offerings:

```json
{
  "offering_id": "carbon-measurement",
  "name": "Carbon Measurement Platform",
  "keywords": [
    "carbon", "sustainability", "emissions",
    "ESG", "scope 3", "carbon footprint", "green"
  ]
}
```

### 2. Set Validity Windows

For time-limited promotions, always set `valid_from` and `valid_to`:

```json
{
  "offering_id": "black-friday",
  "name": "Black Friday Sale",
  "valid_from": "2025-11-28T00:00:00Z",
  "valid_to": "2025-11-29T23:59:59Z"
}
```

Hosts can filter expired offers and avoid showing stale promotions.

### 3. Provide Both URLs When Applicable

Include both `checkout_url` (for direct conversion) and `landing_url` (for information):

```json
{
  "offering_id": "premium-plan",
  "checkout_url": "https://app.com/checkout/premium",
  "landing_url": "https://app.com/pricing"
}
```

### 4. Use Portfolio References for Large Asset Libraries

For offerings with many creative variants, use `portfolio_ref` instead of inline `assets`:

```json
{
  "offering_id": "holiday-campaign",
  "portfolio_ref": "https://cdn.brand.com/portfolios/holiday-2025.json"
}
```
